basicInfo.name: Sun Wukong
basicInfo.flavor: After being sealed and imprisoned within the Marble Mountains for his many misdeeds, Sun Wukong was eventually set free by the monk Sanzang. Afterward, he joined Sanzang's journey, earning recognition for his feats and exploits and became known as the Victorious Fighting Buddha.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 30% chance to inflict Petrify. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Magic Attack.

Normal Attack (Trans).desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Magic Attack 2 time(s). [Additional 50% Crit Rate]
 - 30% chance to inflict Petrify. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Magic Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate to 100%.

Skill 1.name: Jumbo Pole
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 53% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 62% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1 (Trans).name: Jumbo Pole: Specter
Skill 1 (Trans).desc:
3 Enemies
 - Grants an additional 10% Damage Boost each time the number of targets is reduced by 1.
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 86% of Magic Attack plus 6% of the target's Max HP 3 time(s). (HP-based damage limited to 100% of caster's Attack) [Additional 50% Crit Rate]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 102% of Magic Attack plus 7% of the target's Max HP.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate to 100%.

Skill 2.name: Clone Beatdown
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 43% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Petrify. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Damage Resistance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants Clone. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Crowd Control Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Damage Resistance to 15%.

Skill 2 (Trans).name: Clone Beatdown: Specter
Skill 2 (Trans).desc:
All Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict Block Rate Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Grants an additional 5% Damage Boost each time the number of targets is reduced by 1.
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 68% of Magic Attack 3 time(s). [Additional 50% Crit Rate]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 82% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Block Rate Reduction to 33%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate to 100%.

Passive.name: Final Clone
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 135% of the caster's Magic Attack upon triggering Guts. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Attack-Based Defense Boost. [Always Active]
 - Reduces skill cooldowns by 10s upon being hit by an enemy's attack.
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 35% of the caster's Magic Attack upon using a skill 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 155% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 45% of Magic Attack.
超越2段階達成効果
 - All Allies
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 95% of the caster's Magic Attack when HP falls to 50% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Sanzang, Xuanzang, Peaches, Liquor, Free-spiritedness, Hot springs, Swimming, Stimulation
profile.dislikes: Pascal, Dellons, Freyja, piping-hot noodles, oppression, irresponsibility, dark caves, the Golden Circlet
profile.story: After being sealed and imprisoned within the Marble Mountains for his many misdeeds, Sun Wukong was eventually set free by the monk Sanzang. Afterward, he joined Sanzang's journey, earning recognition for his feats and exploits and became known as the Victorious Fighting Buddha.

basicInfo.name: Sun Wukong
basicInfo.flavor: After causing chaos in the Celestial Realm, the Jade Emperor appointed Sun Wukong the role of \"Stable Master\" to keep him in check. But upon learning this, he wreaked further havoc, and was subsequently given another title: \"Great Sage Heaven's Equal.\

basicInfo.name: Sun Wukong
basicInfo.flavor: Sun Wukong is a stone-born monkey from the rocks of Flower-Fruit Mountain. He possessed extraordinary physical capabilities since birth, and quickly subdued the creatures of the mountain and declared himself king.
